__e: All right, Smart, I'll explain this desk to you and then get the hell out of here.
I stand upon my desk to remind myself that we must constantly look at things in a different way.
With garden views, this room offers a safety deposit box, work desk and a bathroom with a bath tub and shower.
She was standing here by the desk and the... the murderer came in by that door.
I've been sitting at your desk...
